column2: NA
NA
1. Prior to 1960, interest payments to persons (line 23) and
interest receipts on line 9 are not shown separately, but are
included in interest payments (line 22), which is shown net
of interest receipts. Miscellaneous receipts on line 9 includes
rents and royalties received by governments.
2. Prior to 1959, subsidies (line 25) and the current surplus of government enterprises
(line 14) are not shown separately; subsidies are presented net of the current surplus
of government enterprises.
3. Prior to 1960, government social benefits to the rest of the world are included in line 21,
"other current transfer payments to the rest of the world (net)."
